title: Conversion Therapy Doesn't Work
description: @Chican3ry dives into archives to find numerous examples of ways psychotherapy has found over and over that trans people can not be made cis.
preview: Conversion Therapy doesn’t work. We know it doesn’t work. How do we know it doesn’t work? Because psychologists have tried to use it for over a century and keep finding that it doesn’t work!
author: Chican3ry
